meanings.definition: Showing a lack of courage or determination; timid.
meanings.sent1: The pusillanimous puppy cowered at the sound of thunder.
meanings.sent2: He was too pusillanimous to stand up for himself when bullied.
meanings.sent3: The pusillanimous squirrel ran away from a tiny butterfly.
meanings.sent4: Her pusillanimous behavior was like a wilting flower in the face of adversity.
meanings.sent5: The pusillanimous mouse trembled at the sight of the cat's shadow.

meanings.definition: Cowardly or fearful in the face of danger.
meanings.sent1: The pusillanimous soldier fled from the battlefield in fear.
meanings.sent2: She felt pusillanimous when asked to speak in front of a large crowd.
meanings.sent3: The pusillanimous ghost was scared of its own reflection.
meanings.sent4: His pusillanimous heart beat like a frightened rabbit's.
meanings.sent5: The pusillanimous explorer turned back at the first sign of danger.
